reviewText: Lots of dragon activity. Kinda low budget but the dragons make up for it. Was definitely worth the money.
Our grandson is fascinated with dragons.  We watched this movie together.  Very pleased, enjoyable.
This is also A good Dragon movie it's up with the best. TOM T.-1/08/2016-8:12 Am.
Sorry, I have not had a chance to watch it yet.  Dragons are a 'thing' of mine

what a fantastic movie
it has a good story line the action was good the special effects were good
i wished it was at least another one and half to two hours longer to make it and epic as i could not get enough of it
it is one for the collection for all fantasy movie buffs
